installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive
export HOME=/mnt/server
echo -e "\u001b[1m\u001b[33m[INFO] [INSTALLER] Installing Dependencies...\u001b[0m"
apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends ca-certificates curl unzip lib32gcc-s1
rm -rf $HOME/Steam && mkdir -p $HOME/Steam
curl -SL https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz | tar zxf - -C $HOME/Steam
echo -e "\u001b[1m\u001b[33m[INFO] [INSTALLER] Installing Game...\u001b[0m"
$HOME/Steam/steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir $HOME +login anonymous +app_update 1110390 +quit
if [[ $ROCKET_MOD -eq 1 ]]; then
echo -e "\u001b[1m\u001b[33m[INFO] [INSTALLER] Installing RocketMod...\u001b[0m"
rm -rf $HOME/Modules/Rocket.Unturned/ && cp -r $HOME/Extras/Rocket.Unturned/ $HOME/Modules/
fi
if [[ $OPEN_MOD -eq 1 ]]; then
echo -e "\u001b[1m\u001b[33m[INFO] [INSTALLER] Installing OpenMod...\u001b[0m"
curl -SLo OpenMod.Unturned.zip https://github.com/openmod/openmod/releases/latest/download/OpenMod.Unturned.Module.zip
rm -rf $HOME/Extras/OpenMod.Unturned/ && unzip -q OpenMod.Unturned.zip -x Readme.txt -d $HOME/Extras/ && rm OpenMod.Unturned.zip
rm -rf $HOME/Modules/OpenMod.Unturned/ && cp -r $HOME/Extras/OpenMod.Unturned/ $HOME/Modules/
fi
echo -e "\u001b[1m\u001b[33m[INFO] [INSTALLER] Finished Installing...\u001b[0m"
